product_name: Klean Kanteen Bamboo Water Bottle Cap
long_description: This Klean Kanteen Bamboo water bottle cap is fashioned from a single piece of 18/8 food-grade stainless steel and finished with attractive bamboo wood. Clip a small carabiner (sold separately) to the stainless-steel bail and attach your water bottle to a backpack strap. Cap is interchangeable with all Klean Kanteen Classic sizes of water bottles (bottle sold separately). Handwash the wood cap and dry immediately.
short_description: This Klean Kanteen Bamboo water bottle cap is fashioned from a single piece of 18/8 food-grade stainless steel and finished with attractive bamboo wood.
